name: BibleTalkShow
0:
”Alexa, open Bible Talk Show”
”Alexa, ask Bible Talk Show for the latest talk”
”Alexa, start Bible Talk Show”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: bible talk show
des: Listen to the latest talks from the Christian Talk Show. You can pause and play by saying "Alexa, pause" and "Alexa, resume." Just say "Alexa, stop" when you're done for the day. When listening to podcasts you can say "Alexa, shuffle" to shuffle the playing order, or "Alexa, loop" to loop the current episode. You can also ask for previous and next episodes by saying "Alexa, previous" and "Alexa, next". This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
